<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Timeless Nature](/Feats.aspx?ID=4757) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

With primal magic sustaining you, you cease aging. The overflowing primal energy gives you a +2 status bonus to saves against diseases and primal magic.
name: Timeless Nature
